alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 7:56AM CDT until July 30 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sioux County in south central North Dakota... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 755 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Selfridge, or 19 miles northwest of Mclaughlin, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Selfridge around 800 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Standing Rock and eastern Standing Rock Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
